description:
Powerful text editing tool

Powerful text editing tool with syntax highlighting support for programming languages and scripts, multi-caret and synchronized editing, code/text folding, over 600 options for customizing, over 100 ready made skins, ChatGPT, spell checker, image/PDF view, Markdown/RTF/SVG preview, character map, numerical unit convert tool, text compare, JSON/SQL/XML formatter, support for multiple directories (also SFTP) and search results, etc.
- Added completion proposal options
- Added heuristic detection for MATLAB and Objective-C files (*.m)
- Added highlighter for Objective-C++
- Added show code folding for Bython option (default false)
- Added status bar options
- Added Tokyo Light editor theme
- Added Tokyo Night editor theme
- Fixed AlphaSkins for Delphi 13 - https://www.alphaskins.com/
- Fixed application closing
- Fixed code folding
- Fixed color themes
- Fixed file types
- Fixed highlighters
- Fixed large file issues
- Fixed options
- Fixed search
- Fixed sidebar menu
- Fixed simple mode
- Fixed status bar
- Fixed text editor control - https://github.com/TextEditorPro/TTextEditor
- Updated Delphi and C++ Builder 13 - https://www.embarcadero.com/products/rad-studio
- Updated Image32 library - https://github.com/AngusJohnson/Image32
- Updated Inno Setup 6.5.4 - https://jrsoftware.org/
- Updated language files
- Updated PDFium 142.0.7442.0 binaries (DLL files) - https://github.com/bblanchon/pdfium-binaries

Note! This product is always completely FREE for you. See the license.
